p: We also selected and verified ten representatively upregulated DEGs involved in cell wall organization through qRT-PCR analysis. The mRNA levels of XTH31, PME16, PMEI6, and EXPA15 were upregulated by almost 2-fold in the gpat1 mutant( Figure 7B), while those of RGP3, XYN4, and CSLB3, which are involved in cell wall polysaccharide biosynthesis or modification, were also upregulated by almost 1.5- to 3-fold, respectively, in the gpat1 mutant ( Figure 7B). The transcript levels of EXT4 and the galactose oxidase RUBY were also enhanced by 1.5-fold, while that of PER36 increased by 1.6-fold in the gpat1 mutants ( Figure 7B). After verifying the accuracy of our transcriptomics data through qRT-PCR, we determined that our RNA-Seq and qRT-PCR data were highly correlated, with an R 2 of 0.9531 ( Figure 7C).
